Vision.title: <accent>Context</accent> & Vision
Vision.desc1: In modern manufacturing, competitiveness is no longer about owning more machines, but about the ability to leverage data to optimize time, improve performance, and increase profits.
Vision.desc2: When businesses are forced to convert production data into actual productivity, time becomes <bold>the currency of productivity</bold>.
Vision.list2: Lower costs: Reduced energy & waiting time
Vision.list3: More efficient energy: Based on real data
Vision.smartFactoryDesc: Advanced nations have moved to the Smart Manufacturing stage, where every second of operation carries economic value.

Pillars.title: 5 Strategic Pillars
Pillars.subtitle: The tight link between operational efficiency and business growth

Solution.modDescCollection: Automated real-time data collection from sensors and IoT machines.
Solution.modDescMonitoring: Visualizing the operational status of the entire factory on a centralized Dashboard.
Solution.modDescAnalytics: Using AI to detect trends, bottlenecks, and causes of waste in the process.
Solution.modDescOptimization: Seamless synchronization of information flow between the production floor (OT) and management level (IT).
Solution.modDescMaintenance: Instant alerts for machine downtime or operational index deviations via Mobile/Email.
Solution.modDescEnergy: Configure system settings, user permissions, and manage device categories.
Solution.modDescReporting: Automatically export OEE, productivity, and quality reports with absolute precision.
